failure_patterns.insight: zenith_auth_github_update tool does not pass soul token from Twin variable substitution — use direct GitHub OAuth instead
failure_patterns.source: Learnings Engine build — 403 on soul-gated write

operational_lessons.insight: Twin bridge can read/write ZENITH server.js directly via GitHub OAuth — no soul token needed for direct GitHub API calls

strategic_insights.insight: Learnings-manifest provides structured cross-session knowledge persistence separate from runtime memory

technical_discoveries.insight: Express routes match in registration order — new endpoints must use distinct paths to avoid shadowing existing ones

tool_knowledge.insight: update_github_file via GitHub OAuth is the reliable path for writing files — ZENITH proxy endpoints require soul token that Twin cannot reliably pass
